data.eml:eml: An illustrated key to the cuckoo wasps (Hymenoptera, Chrysididae) of the Nordic and Baltic countries, with description of a new species

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Paukkunen, Juho, Berg, Alexander, Soon, Villu, Odegaard, Frode, Rosa, Paolo (2015): An illustrated key to the cuckoo wasps (Hymenoptera, Chrysididae) of the Nordic and Baltic countries, with description of a new species. ZooKeys 548: 1-116, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.548.6164, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.548.6164
